title: Delivery of document of gift not required; right to
context: [ยง327-13] Delivery of document of gift not required; right to examine. (a) A document of gift need not be delivered during the donor&rsquo;s lifetime to be effective. (b) Upon or after an individual&rsquo;s death, a person in possession of a document of gift or a refusal to make an anatomical gift with respect to the individual shall allow examination and copying of the document of gift or refusal by a person authorized to make or object to the making of an anatomical gift with respect to the individual or by a person to which the gift could pass under section 327-11. [L 2008, c 122, pt of ยง1]
